Harpy.name: Laesha
Harpy.description: Some forty foot of coiled thick serpentine tail is something that catches your eye almost before seeing her upper body. The lamia clad in a tanktop, loincloth and an idle smile as she contemplates you with a gaze that while predatory is more perhaps mercantile than voracious. Her hair is neatly trimmed to neck length, dark and highlighted with green dye that matches the colour of her scaled lower body.
